attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A quotation from release organisation magazine:

"Since 2002 the autocratic regime of president Isoias Afewerki has detained well over 2,000 christians without trail, and has forced dozens of churches and ministries to close. Many believers have been tortured to force them to renounce their faith."

To my brothers and sisters out there. The time is to act now please sign this petition,

A quote from the scripture in the Holy Bible,  chapter 2 Corinthians 3:2:

"You... are a letter from Christ... written not with ink but with the Spirit of the living God, not of tablets of stone, but on tablets of human hearts."

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
